text: The 1921 Southwest Texas State Normal School Bobcats football team represented Southwest Texas State Normal School in the 1921 college football season. The 1921 Texas State team posted its first undefeated season. The Texas Normal championship also earned entry into the Texas Intercollegiate Athletic Association (TIAA). ==Schedule== ==References== Southwest Texas State Category:Texas State Bobcats football seasons Southwest Texas State Bobcats football
title: 1921 Southwest Texas State Bobcats football team
